introduction: I am an interaction designer who treats research as storytelling and prototyping as play. I am happiest when translating complex systems into approachable, human experiences.
values: Curiosity, care, and craft guide everything I build. I believe design is a collaborative conversation.
story: Currently pursuing my BDes in Interaction Design at MIT Institute of Design (MIT-ADT University), Pune. I have worked across civic tech, wellness, and educational storytelling projects. My process pairs rigorous research with whimsical details that invite people in.
